entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56808
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #56807
  • Improve xml doc for Microsoft.Extensions.Localization package. #56801
  • Use System.Threading.Lock throughout ASP.NET Core #56794
  • Attributes implementing `IRouteTemplateProvider` should only be allowed on `public` methods #56791
  • Kestrel as a TCP server only #56790
  • AddHealthChecks() doesn't work with AllowAnonymous in dotnet 8 #56789
  • Using trailing slash in ResourcesPath breaks resources reoslution. #56788
  • Perf improvement: single_query #56785

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56787
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextSansFilter #56756
  • Perf regression: json, single_query #56786
  • `Enhance your security on the web` feature of microsoft edge, slow downs blazor webassembly as hell #56806
  • Hard to debug role-based authorization failures #56734
  • .NET 8 Blazor @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "Admin")] not working #56773
  • ServerAuthenticationStateProvider.SetAuthenticationState() throws an exception #56733
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in hybrid cache when locking #56638
  • Static Readonly Field Value Gets Replaced #56775
  • Perf improvement: json #56781
  • Perf regression: updates #56782
  • Blazor server closes when downloading a file with Libre Wolf browser exited with code 4294967295 (0xffffffff). #56596
  • SignalR GET with body #55749

PullRequests

Created

  • Add generic variants of ProducesProblem and ProducesValidationProblem #56810
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #56803
    area-mvc
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm package cache 2024-07-15 #56802
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Amortise HTTP Result Content-Type arrays #56525
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24365.8 #56793
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Use UtcNowParameterKey constant to replace usages of "UtcNow" in DatabaseOperations.cs #56442
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Look up trusted certs consistently on windows #56701
    area-commandlinetools
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56725
    area-mvc
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
